price: 19. Ee ogow (kuna sugnow) inuusan jirin Ilaah (Xaq lagu caabudo) aan aheyn Alle, una denbi dhaaf dalab naftaada iyo mu’miniinta iyo mu’minooyinka. Allena wuu Og yahay socsocodkiinna iyo negaantiinnaba.
arabic: فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمۡ وَمَثۡوَىٰكُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-iʿ'lam annahu lā ilāha illā al-lahu wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika walil'mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wal-lahu yaʿlamu mutaqallabakum wamathwākum
